bwwExcerpt: "Brand recognition - if you've got it, flaunt it. That  thinking jump-starts the new musical "The Addams Family." After the  famous Da Da Da Dum! Snap Snap!, Gomez (Nathan Lane) and Morticia (Bebe  Neuwirth) lead their kooky clan in a moonlit anthem celebrating their  ghoulish ways. The scene, set in a spooky-cool graveyard, could be right  out of a cartoon by Charles Addams, who created the characters. It  makes for a tasty beginning. Then the rest of the sho
